question: Which paper measured how well the source-translation contribution by the translation model can be used to detect its own hallucinations?
answer_format: Your answer should be the title of the paper WITHOUT ANY EXPLANATION.

eval_kwargs.question: Which paper measured how well the source-translation contribution by the translation model can be used to detect its own hallucinations?
eval_kwargs.reference_answer: Detecting and Mitigating Hallucinations in Machine Translation: Model Internal Workings Alone Do Well, Sentence Similarity Even Better
